member.name: M:Body_Builder.Model.ExerciseRepository.getExercisesFromAppData
member.summary: This Method will open ExerciseData.txt, read each line, process that line as an Exercise, and add it to _exercises list

member.name: M:Body_Builder.Model.ExerciseRepository.storeExercisesInAppData
member.summary:
This method will wipe the contents of ExerciseData.txt in the local App Data and then write the contents of each element in _exercises on their own line.
Each Line of an exercise will be formated as: Name,Sets,Reps,Weight

member.name: M:Body_Builder.Model.ExerciseRepository.editExercise(System.Int32,Body_Builder.Model.Exercise)
member.summary: This method will search _exercise list to find the exercise with the cooresponding exerciseId. If it exists, it will change the Exercise attributes to match the second arguement

member.name: M:Body_Builder.Model.ExerciseRepository.AddExercise(Body_Builder.Model.Exercise)
member.summary: This method will accept an Exercise parameter and append it to the list. It's contact Id
